name: Catch Me If You Can
description:
Your childhood revisited.

Play with up to 6 people in this fast-paced, movement-centered action game.


Based off the playground classic, "Tag", one player becomes "Cursed" at the beginning of every round and has to curse another player at any cost. If the timer runs out while you are cursed, you will die. The game continues until only one man is left standing.

What is there included?

  • Work together with your allies to devise a scheme and prevent the cursed player from catching up.
  • Enjoy a dynamically crafted soundtrack as the music fittingly changes throughout the match.
  • Find yourself gaining positive side effects from being cursed - such as an immense boost to speed and less energy consumption - which help you bewitch another player in order to free your own soul.
